languages.text: "Спасибо, спасибо вам, Лорд-капитан! По гроб жизни у вас в долгу буду, так и знайте! Ну что же, дверка, до скорой встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Спасибо, спасибо вам Лорд-капитан! По гроб жизни у вас в долгу буду, так и знайте! Ну что же, дверка, до скорой встречи".

languages.text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо, спасибо вам, Лорд-капитан! По гроб жизни у вас в долгу буду, так и знайте! Ну что же, дверка, до скорой встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to it! Well, door, I'll see you soon."
"Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to it! Well, door, I'll see you soon."
"Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."
"Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."
"Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

languages.text: “谢谢你，太谢谢你了，舰长大人！我永远欠你这个人情，直到我咽气的那天！我是说真的！好了，神秘的大门，我马上就要见到你了。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，太谢谢你了，舰长大人！我永远欠你这个人情，直到我咽气的那天！我是说真的！好了，神秘的大门，我马上就要见到你了。”

languages.text: «¡Gracias, gracias, Lord Capitán! Estaré en deuda con usted hasta el final de mis días, ¡se lo juro! Pronto nos veremos las caras, puertecita».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias, gracias, Lord Capitán! Estaré en deuda con usted hasta el final de mis días, ¡se lo juro! Pronto nos veremos las caras, puertecita».

languages.text: "Danke, Lord Captain, danke! Ich stehe bis zu meinem Tod in Eurer Schuld, und das dürft Ihr jederzeit einfordern! Tja, Tür, wir sehen uns bald."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Lord Captain, danke! Ich stehe bis zu meinem Tod in Eurer Schuld, und das dürft Ihr jederzeit einfordern! Tja, Tür, wir sehen uns bald."

languages.text: 「本当にありがとう、ロード・キャプテン！死ぬまで恩に着るわ！じゃあね、扉さん。また会いましょ」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

traits.locale_text: 「本当にありがとう、ロード・キャプテン！死ぬまで恩に着るわ！じゃあね、扉さん。また会いましょ」

languages.text: « Oh, merci. Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Cette porte et moi avons désormais rendez-vous. Je vous serai redevable de cette décision jusqu'à mon dernier souffle, j'en fais le serment ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, merci. Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Cette porte et moi avons désormais rendez-vous. Je vous serai redevable de cette décision jusqu'à mon dernier souffle, j'en fais le serment ! »

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim, çok teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan! Öleceğim güne kadar sana borçlu kalacağım, emin olabilirsin! Bekle beni kapı, geliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you, Lord Captain! I'll owe you until the day I die, you can hold me to that! Well, door, I'll see you soon."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim, çok teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan! Öleceğim güne kadar sana borçlu kalacağım, emin olabilirsin! Bekle beni kapı, geliyorum."
